page.shortlink: api alpha5 thread profiler dump method
page.description: Format profiling data collected for the thread and write the results.
page.prototype: thread.Profiler_Dump(Name as C, WriteToFile as L)

argument.name: Name
argument.description: The name of the file or trace window tab.

argument.name: WriteToFile
argument.description: If *[xb:.F.]*, the profiler output will be written to the trace window. If *[xb:.T.]*, profiling data will be written to a file.
